content: from * for round as much of the repeat as possible hats for the whole family round 2 and all even rnds k or p sts as est round 8 * k 1 p 1 repeat from * for round round 3 * p 1 k 2 p2tog k 2 repeat from * for round 9 * k2tog p 1 k 1 repeat from * for round round round 10 * p 1 k 2 repeat from * for round round 5 * k 1 p2tog k 1 p 2 repeat from * for round round 11 * k2tog k 1 repeat from * for round round 7 * p 1 k 1 p 1 k2tog repeat from * for round 12 k round round 13 * k2tog repeat from * for round round 9 * k2tog k 1 p 1 repeat from * for round round 11 * p 1 k2tog repeat from * for round model f shows i-cord finish round 13 * k2tog repeat from * for round decrease as for basic hat until 16 18 16 22 sts rem model j shows spiral rib pattern 72 st hat only k one extra round with 2 decrease move marker so it is after a p st move evenly spaced in round marker 1 st to the left every row follow 88 st hat only k one extra round with 6 decrease decs for model k cont in patt as est evenly spaced in round model k shows k 3 p 1 rib pattern all sizes round 1 * k2tog k 1 p 1 k 3 p 1 repeat from * place first 4 st on dpn join cc 1 k 4 sts for round do not turn work pull yarn snuggly around round 2 and all even rounds k or p sts as est back of work k 4 sts again sliding sts as round 3 * k 2 p 1 k2tog k 1 p 1 repeat from * needed cont until i-cord is 6 long bobble by for round psso all sts over last st repeat 4 st i-cord 3 round 5 * k2tog p 1 k 2 p 1 repeat from * for more times changing colors as desired round round 7 * k 1 p 1 k2tog p 1 repeat from * for fasten_off top of hat and tie opposite i- round cords over each other round 9 * k2tog k 1 p 1 repeat from * for round model i shows double moss pattern end round 11 * k 1 k2tog repeat from * for round after round 4 round 13 * k2tog repeat from * for round round 1 * k2tog p 2 k 2 p 2 repeat from * for designer note round rnds may end with incomplete patterns
